split_mode.description: the mode of split function, such as 'ranges', 'fixed_range', 'remove_pages'.

public_key.description: The api key for using iLovePDF API

ranges.description: Parameter required when the mode is ranges, for example '1,5,10-14'.

fixed_range.description: Parameter required when the mode is fixed_range

remove_pages.description: Parameter required when the mode is remove_pages, for example '1, 4, 8-12, 16'.
